---
title: "Invited speakers"
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(glue)

glue_string <- c(
    "## {full_name} {{#{speaker_id}}}",
    "![](images/{speaker_id}.png){{style='float: left; padding: 20px; border-radius: 30px; width: 120px'}} {summary_research_interests}",
    "Affiliations: *{affiliations}*",
    "\n\n"
)

read_csv(here("data/speakers.csv"), col_types = "c") %>% 
    arrange(full_name) %>% 
    glue_data(str_flatten(glue_string, "\n\n")) %>% 
    cat(sep = "\n\n")
```
